description: Rendering is really nice, but controls are not so much. The whiteball is always in the center of the screen, also during play, so the whole screen moves with the whiteball in the center. This is causing nausea. Mouse controls are not very intuitive, they react differently depending on the virtual position of the pointer. And when you zoom out you seem to stand 3 meters away from the table due to perspective. No queue, no spin - these are essential.
summary: nicely rendered, but whiteball always in center of screen

description: Playing for a long time and never got bored !

Quite a good beta version, and could become a solid game once, but still needs a lot of development work. One major drawback to note first of all is that you always start looking into the end of the queue instead of holding it under your eye, as you normally would. And then there are many fine-tuning issues, up to mistranslated or incongruently mixed in German labels here and there. Really has potential and I hope it will within time get fully developed into what could become a top classic one day, and maybe a staple for Ubuntu gaming.

j'aime bien ce jeux avec tout les options et les vues 3D
Merci, je vous ferai parvenir une contribution si je trouve où transférer la somme.
merci pour ce travail, et merci pour la détente que ce jeux me procure.

J'adore ce jeu de billard 3 dimension, il est vraiment bien fait. GÉNIAL, les effets, le visuel etc. 
Vraiment, j'aimerais avoir ton courriel pour te faire ma contribution pour cet oeuvre de programmation.

erriicc
